alert.note: Alert for Heard; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Heard and northwestern Troup Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 915 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Wares Crossroads, or 8 miles northwest of LaGrange, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds 40 to 50 mph, nickel sized hail and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Locations impacted include... LaGrange, Franklin, Texas, Harrisonville, Hillcrest, Wares Crossroads and Glenn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Electrical appliances should not be used unless in an emergency.
